recipes.title: R.I.P. Pudding
recipes.instructions: Make instant chocolate pudding according to package directions and pour into serving bowls.  Refrigerate to set.Remove frosting from 12 Oreo cookies.  Place cookie halves in a Ziploc bag and crush with a rolling pin until a mixture of fine and pea-size cookie crumbs.  Set aside.Microwave 1/4 cup chocolate chips at 50% power and transfer to Ziploc bag.  Snip 1/4-inch off a corner and squeeze bag to write "R.I.P." on each Milano cookie.  Refrigerate to set.Assemble each graveyard pudding by standing one Milano cookie in each pudding.  Sprinkle crushed Oreo cookies on top of the pudding and around the tombstones.As always, ENJOY!  :)

steps.step: Make instant chocolate pudding according to package directions and pour into serving bowls.  Refrigerate to set.

Place cookie halves in a Ziploc bag and crush with a rolling pin until a mixture of fine and pea-size cookie crumbs.  Set aside.Microwave 1/4 cup chocolate chips at 50% power and transfer to Ziploc bag.  Snip 1/4-inch off a corner and squeeze bag to write "R.I.P." on each Milano cookie.  Refrigerate to set.Assemble each graveyard pudding by standing one Milano cookie in each pudding.  Sprinkle crushed Oreo cookies on top of the pudding and around the tombstones.As always, ENJOY!  :)
